::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod manages to avoid most of the armery heading towards him, but is
hit with enough to nock him to the ground, and cause exstream strucual
damage.
"And I'm going to continue to be that pain in the ass, idiot!"
Hot Rod then shoots 6 plasma charges at Hell Beast.
